name: ALLTEL Corporation
overview: Alltel Corporation provides telecommunication solutions. It offers wireless voice and data communication, postpaid and prepaid wireless calling card, roaming and long-distance calling, and data solutions. The company provides text and video messaging digital gaming, radio streaming, Internet access, and emailing services. Additionally, it offers mobile handsets and accessories. The company provides business intelligence, field service automation, security, and systems management services. It caters to transportation, retail, insurance, healthcare, construction, and financial services industries.
